title:
Technology News | ⚡Satya Nadella-Run Microsoft Reaches a USD 3 Trillion 
Market Cap; Becomes Second Company After Apple
text: By IANS Microsoft reached a $3 trillion market cap, the first time in its 48-year history. The Satya Nadella-run company reached the milestone valuation after its stock climbed 1.5 per cent in trading on Nasdaq late on Wednesday.
